TuT8DNBBkrbjgeMq.range: One creature you can see within 30 feet.

system.description: Starting at 8th level, your premonitions are more powerful. Your Unfickle Fate feature now lasts up to 8 hours. In addition you gain one premonition per long rest. Roll a [[/r d20]]. You may apply its number to the ability check, attack roll, or saving throw of a creature you can see within 30 feet. Once you use this feature, you cannot do so again until you finish a long rest.
